body.p: Cash flows arising from each of the following activities of a financial institution may be reported on a net basis:

li.p: cash receipts and payments for the acceptance and repayment of deposits with a fixed maturity date;
the placement of deposits with and withdrawal of deposits from other financial institutions; and
cash advances and loans made to customers and the repayment of those advances and loans.
